Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Relates to issuing temporary permits to certain fantasy sports operators
Summary: Relates to issuing temporary permits to certain fantasy sports operators that were not offering contests to persons located in New York prior to November 10, 2015.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to issuing temporary permits to certain fantasy sports operators
